trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_JALZAHN_000_000<tab>By soulglazing your relic, I can render it aethertight, thus allowing the soul energy within to fully attune to its host.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_MENU_TITLE<tab>Select the relic you wish to have soulglazed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_MENU_CHOICES<tab><var 28 ((Item)) E8020A /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_YESNO_MESSAGE<tab>Have <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> soulglazed?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_YESNO_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_JALZAHN_000_030<tab>Where is the relic? Perchance you forgot to bring it?

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Please ensure that the relic you wish to have soulglazed is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory before speaking with Jalzahn.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_JALZAHN_000_040<tab>Hm, it appears that this relic has already been soulglazed. The rest is up to you, my friend. With your weapon in hand, do that which you do best: adventure. In due course, the spirit energy it bears shall become fully attuned.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Completing certain activities while equipped with your soulglazed relic weapon will increase its soul attunement level.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>By using the Zodiac glass, it is possible to visually verify attunement progress.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>Once your relic weapon novus has achieved full soul attunement, you may present it to Jalzahn to have it upgraded to a relic weapon nexus.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_JALZAHN_000_100<tab>Without further ado, I shall apply soulglaze to your weapon. Not a spot shall be left uncoated.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_JALZAHN_000_101<tab>...Yes, that should do it. The relic is now completely aethertight.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_JALZAHN_000_102<tab>With your weapon in hand, do that which you do best: adventure. In due course, the spirit energy it bears shall become fully attuned.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>Completing certain activities while equipped with your soulglazed relic weapon will increase its soul attunement level.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>By using the Zodiac glass, it is possible to visually verify attunement progress.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>Once your relic weapon novus has achieved full soul attunement, you may present it to Jalzahn to have it enhanced to a relic weapon nexus.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>The upgraded weapon will retain the power it received from materia by way of the sphere scroll.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040ENHANCEMODE_00207_SYSTEM_000_114<tab>It is possible to alter the materia-enhanced properties of your relic, both before and after the aforementioned upgrade. To initiate the process, please speak with Jalzahn.
